Jupyter安装python2/3 kernel

{% if site.github.releases[0] %} {% assign release = site.github.releases[0] %}

Latest release: {{release.tag_name}} ({{release.published_at | date: '%B %e, %Y'}})

{% endif %}
  • Python3里安装Python2 Kernel
python2 -m pip install ipykernel
python2 -m ipykernel install --user
  • Python2里安装Python3 Kernel

把上面的python2 换成 python3就可以了。

python3 -m pip install ipykernel
python3 -m ipykernel install --user

详细信息请参考官方文档
